name: ExportOptionsJPEG
shortdesc: Options which may be supplied when exporting a document as a JPEG file.

property.name: optimization
property.shortdesc: Should the image be optimized for web viewing.

property.name: blurAmount
property.shortdesc: Blur the resulting image this much.

property.name: matte
property.shortdesc: Should the artboard be matted with a color.

property.name: matteColor
property.shortdesc: The color to use when matting the artboard (default: white)

property.name: antiAliasing
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be antialiased.

property.name: artBoardClipping
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be clipped to the artboard.

property.name: saveAsHTML
property.shortdesc: Should the resulting image be saved as HTML.
